description: Media protection policy and procedures documentation, including roles, responsibilities, review frequency, and approval records
Access control lists or authorization matrices for digital and non-digital media containing sensitive information
Media marking procedures and examples of marked media showing distribution limitations, handling caveats, and security markings
Media storage inventory records and physical security controls documentation for controlled areas where media is stored
Media transport procedures, including encryption methods, accountability logs, and authorized courier personnel list
Media sanitization procedures compliant with NIST SP 800-88, including sanitization techniques for disposal and reuse
Media sanitization logs documenting review, approval, tracking, verification, and disposal actions
Sanitization equipment testing records and validation results conducted at least every six months
Procedures for nondestructive sanitization of portable storage devices prior to system connection
Media use restrictions policy and technical controls documentation for portable storage devices and removable media
